actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway and bridge demonstration project to improve traffic safety in South Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway and bridge demonstration project providing grading, surfacing, and structural work over Hell Canyon on U.S. Route 16 in South Dakota to demonstrate methods of improving highway safety and accelerating highway construction. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway and bridge demonstration project to improve traffic safety in South Dakota.
